sentences.en: As for the gentleman himself, his feelings were chiefly expressed, not by embarrassment or dejection, or by trying to avoid her, but by stiffness of manner and resentful silence.
sentences.cn: 说到那位先生本人，他可并不显得意气沮丧，也没有表现出要回避她的样子，只是气愤愤地板着脸，默然无声。

sentences.en: Dejection spiritually is wrong, and we are always to blame for it.
sentences.cn: 灵性低潮是不对的, 我们也只能责备自己.

sentences.en: Following the disappearance of Esta , there had settled a period of dejection which still endured.
sentences.cn: 爱丝塔失踪以后, 全家人一直闷闷不乐.

sentences.en: He was in that condition, the last phase of dejection, in which sorrow no longer flows; it is coagulated, so to speak; there is something on the soul like a clot of despair.
sentences.cn: 他停留在这种状态，沮丧的最后阶段，这时痛苦已不再发生变化，可以说它已经凝固了；就象灵魂上凝聚着失望一样。

sentences.en: He was leaning against a table in the hall, heavy with dejection or sleep.
sentences.cn: 他在门厅里靠着一张桌子站着, 由于沮丧或者瞌睡而显得很颓唐.

sentences.en: Her face showed her dejection at missing the party.
sentences.cn: 她因错过聚会而面露懊丧之色.

sentences.en: In a moment of deep dejection she thought of taking her own life.
sentences.cn: 她一时极度沮丧想寻短见.

sentences.en: Over the past four years, I have seen his face evolve into picture of dejection.
sentences.cn: 在过去的四年多的时间里，他的面容逐渐变成一副沮丧的样子。

sentences.en: Since dietary fibers can combine with cholic acid, the generated bilirubin will be discharged with dejection.
sentences.cn: 因为膳食纤维可以和胆酸结合, 生成胆红素随粪便排出.

sentences.en: The loser sat slumped in dejection.
sentences.cn: 失败者垂头丧气地坐着,全身瘫软.

sentences.en: There was a slight air of dejection about her.
sentences.cn: 她看上去稍微有点儿沮丧。

sentences.en: Timidity is the bridge to dejection.
Tomato fibre can improve apparently intestinal peristalsis, and increase dejection amounts, weights, and elevate defecation frequents.
sentences.cn: 结果显示番茄纤维能明显促进小鼠小肠运动 、 增加粪便粒数 、 重量和提高排便频率.

sentences.en: We regular check on its physical conditions, food taking and dejection during the quarantine period.
sentences.cn: 在检疫期间我们定期检查她的身体状况, 饮食和排泄情况.

sentences.en: Your dejection will do no good to your health.
sentences.cn: 你的沮丧情绪于你的健康不利.
